title: See what our residents are raving about! East Perimeter Pointe Apartments
posting_body: ['East Perimeter Pointe Apartments', 'Visit our community today!', '4946 Snapfinger Woods Dr. Decatur, GA 30035', 'show contact info', 'Unit Rates:', '$1438/month', 'Unit Type:', '2-BR 2.5-BA', 'Unit Size:', '1350 - 1365 sq ft', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'For more information, please call our leasing office.', 'What you’ll find in our community:', '➢ 24 Hour Availability', '➢ Accepts Electronic Payments', '➢ Resident Referral Bonuses', '➢ Trail, Bike, Hike, Jog', 'Description:', 'The thriving neighborhood of East Decatur is uniquely suited to your apartment needs, offering peace and tranquility while keeping you engaged with the culture and excitement of the greater Atlanta area.', 'You can enjoy a mere 15-minute drive to downtown Decatur and a short 20-minute drive to the airport.', "You'll also
